com.reveldigital.motion.image

Class ImageProcessing

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reveldigital.motion.image.ImageProcessing

  • public abstract class ImageProcessing
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is used to process images.

      • getARGB

        public static float[] getARGB(int pixel)
        Get RGB values from pixel.
        Parameters:
        pixel - Integer representation of a pixel.
        Returns:
        float array of a,r,g,b values.

      • convertToHSL

        public static int[] convertToHSL(int r,
                 int g,
                 int b)
        Get HSL (Hue, Saturation, Luma) from RGB. Note1: H is 0-360 (degrees) Note2: S and L are 0-100 (percent)
        Parameters:
        r - Red value.
        g - Green value.
        b - Blue value.
        Returns:
        Integer array representing an HSL pixel.

      • decodeYUV420SPtoLuma

        public static int[] decodeYUV420SPtoLuma(byte[] yuv420sp,
                         int width,
                         int height)
        Decode a YUV420SP image to Luma.
        Parameters:
        yuv420sp - Byte array representing a YUV420SP image.
        width - Width of the image.
        height - Height of the image.
        Returns:
        Integer array representing the Luma image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if yuv420sp byte array is NULL.

      • decodeYUV420SPtoRGB

        public static int[] decodeYUV420SPtoRGB(byte[] yuv420sp,
                        int width,
                        int height)
        Decode a YUV420SP image to RGB.
        Parameters:
        yuv420sp - Byte array representing a YUV420SP image.
        width - Width of the image.
        height - Height of the image.
        Returns:
        Integer array representing the RGB image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if yuv420sp byte array is NULL.

      • rgbToBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap rgbToBitmap(int[] rgb,
                                  int width,
                                  int height)
        Convert an RGB image into a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        rgb - Integer array representing an RGB image.
        width - Width of the image.
        height - Height of the image.
        Returns:
        Bitmap of the RGB image.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if RGB integer array is NULL.

        Returns:

        Rotate the given Bitmap by the given degrees.

        degrees - Degrees to rotate.

      • rotate

        public static byte[] rotate(byte[] data,
            int degrees)
        Rotate the given image in byte array format by the given degrees.
        Parameters:
        data - Bitmap to rotate in byte array form.
        degrees - Degrees to rotate.
        Returns:
        Byte array format of an image which was rotated.
